ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: $Setup.Master_Validation__c.Account_Active__c && NOT($RecordType.Name = "Health & Benefits") && NOT(OR(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Received',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Locked',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Scale_Open',RecordType.DeveloperName = 'HB_Open')) && AND ( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ISPICKVAL( Status__c, 'Received' ), OR( ISBLANK( Commission_Rate__c ) ) )
